name: Hideous Balloon College
description:
Description

You are looking for your First Love again in college...but there are many hideous guys chasing after you--Use balloons to block them out of your way and hope you'll make it to the very end!

Team

Programmer: Ze Ren, Ng Wei Yuen, Selina Lim

Animator: Ze Ren

Artist: Robin, Raymond Hau, Vanessa Ong

Voice: 7YiGim

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/hideous-balloon-college-8
